tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>***** ATTENTION SURVIVORS *****</>

<TextStyle.White>Welcome to the Twisted Whiskers Cluster — a world of adventure, strategy, and survival. Connect with others, claim your territory, and carve your story. Our servers are optimized for PvE and PvP experiences with immersive mechanics, token rewards, and community events.</>
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.Orange>Cluster Overview:</>
Twisted Whiskers PvE includes Valguero and ASArik. Twisted Purrgatory is our dedicated PvP server. All servers feature dynamic events, custom mods, and token rewards through the WebShop. Explore caves, forests, mountains, and hidden biomes. Link your Discord to earn bonus tokens.
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Green>Newest Server Features:</>
- Twisted Kittens Companion In-Game Shop is back in the Radial.
- AAT Button added to the bottom-right of your inventory screen for in-game purchases.
- More token and community mod features coming soon.
- Twisted Whiskers Valguero: PvE adventure with immersive lore.
- Twisted Whiskers ASArik: addition to PvE cluster with unique resources.
- Twisted Purrgatory: dedicated PvP world, thrilling competitive combat.

tab2.text1: Each Tribe may claim two bases per map. Solo players may have one of each. Solo players joining a tribe must dismantle their base and merge with the tribe's official stronghold. Claiming more than your allowed base locations results in admin action.
tab2.text2: Build your dream sanctuary responsibly: no blocking high-resource zones, explorer notes, or artifact caves/terminals. Mega bases require admin approval. No structure spam. Taming traps must be cleaned up after use.
tab2.text3: No offline breeding. No egg theft. Harassment is prohibited. Handle tribe drama respectfully. Admins do not mediate personal conflicts.

tab3.text1: Lost tames or loot? Admins do not replace losses. Tragedy is part of Ark’s survival experience.
tab3.text2: Admin requests are handled in order received. Staff have real-life obligations. Abandoned creatures at other bases or OBs will be wiped without warning.
tab3.text3:
First Offense: Verbal warning + 24hr notice.
Second Offense: structures, tames, or players involved may be wiped.
Failure to correct after 24hrs = automatic second offense.
Third Offense (within 30 days): permanent banishment.

tab4.text1: Normal Players: Update tribe flag monthly. Missing update = tribe wipe. Subscribed Players: Update every 3 months; subscription lapse = follow normal schedule. Admins: Must update every 3 months; failure results in tribe wipe. Items and tames may be auctioned.
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>Flag Colors:</>
- Admin Flag (180d): Jan-Jun: Azure / Twilight, Jul-Dec: Blue / Green
- Donor Flag (90d): Jan-Mar: Purple / Cyan, Apr-Jun: Magenta / Blue, Jul-Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue, Oct-Dec: Red / Navy Blue
- Free To Play (30d): Jan: Blue, Feb: Pink, Mar: Forest Green, Apr: Brick, May: Royal, Jun: Magenta, Jul: Red, Aug: Olive, Sep: Yellow, Oct: Black, Nov: Orange, Dec: Green
tab4.text3: Violation = tribe wipe. Any tribe with incorrect/outdated flag during wipe is fully wiped; partial exceptions not allowed. Items/tames may be salvaged or auctioned, bases may also be auctioned if notable.

tab5.text1:
XP 1.5x | Alpha Kill: 1.33x | Boss: 2.5x | Wild Kill: 1.25x | Crafting: 1.25x
Taming Speed: 5x | Harvest Amount: 2.5x | Water/Food Drain: 0.75x | Health Recovery: 2.5x
Player Damage: 1.25x | Player Resistance: 1.25x | Structure Resistance: 0x | 24hrs = 120min IRL
tab5.text2:
For latest mods, updates, and news: www.twistedkittensgaming.com
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers
tab5.text3: Restarts: 3AM EST daily. Connect Discord and player accounts to use the shop and receive token bonuses.

tab6.text1: All verified player shops follow strict rules: saddles required on tames, no spayed/neutered sales, full stack resources only. Compliance ensures fairness.
tab6.text2: Report violations via GSA radial menu, Discord, or website. Include date, violation type, shop name/location, survivor names. Admins investigate promptly.
tab6.text3: Visit Admin Shop for starter kits, consumables, and unique items: https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/shop
